0 Calories (Crimini Mushroom/Olive Oil/Dash Seasoning Data Missing)

0 mg Sodium (Crimini Mushroom/Olive Oil/Dash Seasoning Data Missing)

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 7 Minutes

Async 3 minutes Preheat pan on heat 5
     |- Wash 8 ounces Crimini Mushroom with strainer
Put 1 tbsp Olive Oil in pan
Put Crimini Mushroom in pan
Async 4 minutes Pan sear Crimini Mushroom
     |- Wash and put away strainer
     |- Wash and put away measuring utensil
Season with Dash Seasoning
